meanings.sent1: The nasute elephant used its trunk to pick up food.
meanings.sent2: The dog's nasute face sniffed the air for any treats.
meanings.sent3: The nasute cat tried to smell the delicious fish from afar.
meanings.sent4: Her nasute sense of smell could detect even the faintest scents.
meanings.sent5: The nasute rabbit's twitching nose was always on alert for danger.

meanings.definition: A person or animal with a prominent nose or snout.
meanings.sent1: The nasute in the painting had a long, elegant nose.
meanings.sent2: The nasute of the anteater helped it catch ants easily.
meanings.sent3: The nasute of the detective led him to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her nasute of smell was so keen, she could identify scents blindfolded.
meanings.sent5: The nasute of the bloodhound made it an excellent tracker.
